mapper.select: select m.memberSeq , m.Id , m.password , m.nickname , m.email , m.phoneNum , m.profile , m.address , m.regdate , m.delflg , m.auth , m.point , a.title , a.`check` , a.partySeq , a.masterId from member AS m INNER JOIN apply AS a ON m.id = a.applyMem where `check` = 1 AND partySeq = #{partySeq};
mapper.insert: insert into msg(targetId, sendId, title, message, sendDate) values(#{targetId}, #{sendId}, #{title}, #{message}, now())
